function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential reliance on unproven technology for virus inactivation","Impact":"Ineffective virus control and spread in the built environment","Mitigation":"Validation and rigorous testing of nanosystems for antiviral properties","Technologies":"Graphene-based nanomaterials for virus inactivation","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"Health organizations and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Limited application reports and proof-of-concept scenarios","Impact":"Uncertain effectiveness in real-world environments","Mitigation":"Further research and development, validation in diverse settings","Technologies":"Nanosystems for surface and water purification","People":"Public users, healthcare workers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health departments"}]}
